description.html:
Snow elf traits

Snow elves gain the following traits

Ability Score Increase. Your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Superior Darkvision. Your darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.
Thick Skin. You gain cold resistance.
Strong Lungs. Living on top of mountains, you are accustomed to thin air. You breathe less often and can hold your breath for up to 15min.
You have advantage on saving throws against coldness, and you have resistance against cold damage.
